code: import React from'react';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jwtDecode}from'jwt-decode';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PrivateRoute=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(!token){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"});}try{const decodedToken=jwtDecode(token);if(decodedToken.role!=='ADMIN'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"});}}catch(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"});}return children;};export default PrivateRoute;
